DEMO_014_MSG_010:
́Magnificent! You did that so quickly! Who would've thought that you'd be THIS good!?
ā
DEMO_014_MSG_020: ́Apparently, you possess even more potential talents than I had originally thought possible!
DEMO_014_MSG_100:
́However, my friends and family are still locked up in that awful stronghold...
ā
DEMO_014_MSG_050:
́ȁ! Could you help us, the Nochoras with your power?
ā
DEMO_014_MSG_130: ́Please! Come to Wood Park with us, it's right up this road!
DEMO_014_MSG_060: ́My kind, the Nochoro, are a peaceful monster race who love tinkering with machinery in our free time.ā
DEMO_014_MSG_140: ́The entrance to Wood Park is there! I'll help too, come on, let's go together!
DEMO_014_MSG_070:
́However, the King of Glutton's Keep, Boshock, recently invaded our home, Wood Park...
ā
DEMO_014_MSG_080: ́He captured all of my fellow Nochoro, including myself, and locked us up in Glutton's Keep!
DEMO_014_MSG_090:
́I heard his plans to eat us, and made a break for it, narrowly escaping with my life in the process...
ā
DEMO_014_MSG_110: ́I desperately want to save everyone, however... The truth is, I'm simply not strong enough to do so on my own...
DEMO_014_MSG_030:
́Very impressive! Well now, I'm certain you were born a Monster Master! 
ā
DEMO_014_MSG_120:
́That's where you come in! I need you to lend us all your strength, and save the Nochoro villagers!
ā
DEMO_014_MSG_040: ́It's unbelievable, meeting you like this. Surely now I can save my tribe...
